inn1.comm: gets a gift first ball. It was short and wide and rising, and KJP slaps it over point with some ferocity
now he slips a fuller length delivery down the leg side and all KJP has to do is to get some bat on it. He doesn't get any bat, but gets some pad on that and the ball runs down fine

another length ball on the leg stump, it hits the batsman as he is shuffling to play it towards the leg side, he gets hit in front of the  leg stump, under the knee roll. The umpire takes some time and then raises his finger. KJP walks up to Dilshan to ask how that looked, but after a lengthy discussion, he is on his way.
short delivery outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and taps it straight to point
short of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman goes on the back foot and tucks it to fine leg for a single
length delivery on the pads, he fails to get bat on that. It hits the pads and rolls towards square leg
he bowls a length delivery that swings down the leg side, called a wide
pushes it fuller and on the middle stump line, Sanga gets solidly behind that and defends it back to the bowler
he beats the bat with a length delivery that goes away with the angle. Sanga plays inside the line
he leaves this one alone, in a strange manner though. Goes forward to play at it, but then takes the bat away from the line of the ball
length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman tucks it to fine leg for a single
he tests Dilshan with a full and wide delivery but the batsman is an expert in dealing with these, drives it hard through cover point for a four

and through that same gap again, this time off a short of length delivery just outside off. The batsman went to the back foot and punched it in the gap. The fielder from third man runs around to cut off the boundary
back of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman drops it in front towards off side and calls for a quick single
short of length delivery just outside off, the batsman drops his wrists and lets this one go through
length delivery outside off, swinging a touch away. Sanga waits in the crease and opens the face to run it to point

oh that could have been close at the non-striker's end! Would have been out! Sanga drove it to the left of mid-on and set off immediately, but he would have been short by some distance had Doherty hit the stumps
length delivery going across the right-hander, left alone by Dilshan
goes fuller around off and middle line, but doesn't get that inswing. Dilshan drives it to straight to midwicket
he keeps leaving these angled deliveries by bringing his bat down, then taking it away from the line of the ball. Looks like he is getting beaten, but he is not

big big wicket this is! Sanga has driven a full and wide delivery straight into the hands of point. It's his bread and butter shot, and he would have backed himself to clear that fielder, but he didn't get much elevation as the fielder takes it just over his head
he gets a yorker first up, but he does well to bring his bat down in time
length delivery on off stump, the batsman gets right behind it and defends it down the pitch
it's full and it's just wide outside off, going away with the angle, Thirimanne covers the line of the stumps and lets this one go through
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
fuller length delivery on off stump, 145 kph, Dilshan takes a forward stride and defends it back to the bowler
length delivery just outside off, the batsman comes forward again and pushes inside the line. the ball goes through to the keeper
wider this time, keeps it full again and Dilshan has had enough of defending, he goes for an on the up drive and is beaten
back of length delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman whips it off his hips to fine leg for a single
short of length outside off, 146 kph, nasty delivery actually as it quickly rose on to the batsman, and it kept rising after Thiri got out of the way and went over the keeper's head
fuller delivery on the pads, clipped fine on the leg side for a single
he bowls a full delivery on the pads, the batsman comes forward and punches it back to the bowler
fuller delivery angled across the batsman, Thirimanne comes forward then lets it go through
he takes a forward step and drives the fuller delivery, but straight to the man at cover
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman waits and tucks it to deep backward square leg for a couple
fuller length delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman tries to work it away to the leg side, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
he bowls it full and outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
back of length delivery on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
he comes forward to drive seeing the fuller length, but it was a slower one - 132 kph - and Dilshan gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
he bowls a back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends off the back foot
he goes slightly wide of the crease and bowls a fuller delivery just wide outside off, 145 kph, Thiri comes forward to play a forceful drive but plays inside the line. Excellent delivery
length delivery just outside off, 144.6 kph, this time the batsman just pushes it past backward point down to third man for a single
he goes very full just outside off, Dilshan tries to drive it, but manages to just block it out to cover
he bowls a length delivery, but this one is on the pads, easily flicked away to fine leg for a single
this time it's on Dilshan's pads and he easily flicks it past square leg for a couple of runs
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to off
more solid front foot defence from the batsman, he plays the length delivery towards cover
he goes for yorker just outside off, but it's a half-volley and is driven hard straight to mid-off
bowls a teasing line just outside off, the batsman comes forward and then lets it go through
he bowls back of length on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
short of length delivery on off stump and Dilshan tries to pull it over midwicket, but gets an inside edge on to his body
length delivery on the pads, the batsman works it to deep square leg for a single
back of length delivery, the batsman dabs it to the left of square leg and calls for a quick single. Dilshan dives in to make his ground, but the fielder missed the stumps
length delivery just outside off, Dilshan comes forward and punches it to mid off
length delivery just outside off, moves a touch away after pitching and Dilshan was beaten as he played inside the line
he bowls a short of length delivery just outside off and immediately the batsman goes on the back foot to play a punch, but he plays it straight to point
he stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery towards off side
nice cracked off the back foot but straight to third man. There wasn't much room to play the cut shot there
he goes on the back foot to this length delivery and punches it straight to the cover fielder
length delivery on the middle stump line, Dilshan goes on the back foot and punches it through the gap at midwicket for a couple of runs
he pushes this one softly to midwicket again for an easy single
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
back of length delivery on off, bounces a touch extra, Dilshan goes on the back foot and defends it to point
slightly short on off stump, and at that pace, the batsman slaps it easily to deep midwicket
beautifully hit through midwicket! He shuffled across and whipped the length delivery through the gap just like Sanga would have..
he draws an outside edge this time with a length delivery outside off, but there is no slip in place and this one runs down to the boundary too
length delivery at a slower pace outside off, the batsman defends it towards off
back of length delivery honing in on off stump, the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman easily whips to fine leg to bring up Sri Lanka's fifty
back of length delivery on off, Thiri works it off the back foot towards midwicket for an easy single
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman belatedly comes forward and pushes it to mid on
length ball angling in on to the pads, the batsman clips it to fine leg for a single
short delivery this time to test the batsman, but Thiri watches that early and ducks under it easily
back of length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover point
beautiful delivery! This was on a length, bowled with a scrambled seam and it just evades the outside edge as Dilshan comes forward to drive it

fuller this time, and Dilshan calls for a single as soon as he punches it towards mid-off. Voges dives across and stops the ball, but had he done it cleanly, it would have surely caused some confusion
back of length delivery on the body, the batsman tucks it to fine leg for a single
length delivery on the middle, Dilshan comes forward and works it away to deep midwicket for a single
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
length delivery on the middle stump line, Dilshan clips it to deep midwicket off the back foot and thinks about a second, but is rightly sent back
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends it to cover
he keeps it tight round about the off stump line, the batsman has no choice but to defend it back to the bowler
length delivery just outside off, a touch slower though, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
he comes on the front foot and drives the length ball stylishly to off, but straight to extra cover
short delivery, Thirimanne takes it on this time and pulls it all along the ground to deep backward square leg
fires one in on the pads, the batsman drives it cover
slower this time, outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it hard to deep extra cover
comes from over the wicket and pushes it through outside off, there is some turn on offer too. The batsman gets hit on the pads, but outside the line of off
tossed up and slower, the batsman comes forward and clips it fine on the leg side with the ball turning in
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long on for an easy single
short and on off stump line, the batsman goes on the back foot and punches it hard to deep cover
back of length delivery on the pads, easily clipped away to fine leg for a single
he comes forward and solidly defends the length delivery back to the bowler
back of length delivery that doesn't bounce much, the batsman goes on the back foot and whips it to deep square leg for a single
length delivery that comes in after hitting the deck, the batsman was shaping for a backfoot punch through cover, but adjust well to chop it towards backward point
full and wide outside off, the batsman drives it to cover and takes off for a single. Faulkner fires a throw in, but Thiri makes it well in time
another length ball comes in after pitching, the batsman defends it towards the leg side this time
he pushes it full and wide outside off and it goes past the outside edge as the batsman pushes inside the line, muted appeal by the keeper
flatter delivery, turns in after pitching, the batsman works it away to backward square leg
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it straight to cover
slower and flighted, drifts in from round the wicket, the batsman gets an outside edge through point as he tries to drive it
tossed up and on the pads, the batsman comes forward and tries to work it away to leg side, gets hit on the pads though
quicker and shorter outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it through point
starts off with a short of length delivery outside off, the batsman whacks  it off the back foot, but straight to point
fuller length delivery on the middle, the batsman drives it straight to the deepish mid on fielder
he goes full this time, but the direction is all wrong. it's on the pads and it's flicked to fine leg with ease
full delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it straight to cover
full and wide outside off, the batsman stretches and guides it to third man for a single
fullish delivery on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-on
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman works it to backward square leg with the turn
beautiful delivery, tossed up and it spun a bit to beat the batsman's intended drive
now he fires this one on the pads. Dilshan is unlucky to miss this sweep
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
tossed up, slower and on a length, the batsman waits and then pushes it to the left of cover for a quick single
pushes it through on off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a single
fuller length delivery wide outside off, the batsman goes for a forceful drive but gets a thick outside edge. There is no slip and it runs to the boundary
similar delivery, but this time he drives it on the up through extra cover beautifully for a couple
slower delivery this time, it's full and on off stump line, the batsman pushes it to mid-off
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it towards point
he comes down the pitch this time and makes room as well, drives the length delivery over the cover fielder and finds the boundary easily.
he comes forward and drives this fuller delivery down to mid-off
nicely bowled again! Tossed up and slower outside off, Dilshan is beaten as he tries to wristily push it through off
pushed through on the pads, the batsman turns it to square leg for a single
he takes a couple of steps forward, but the ball is fired full outside off, it's dug out towards mid off
slower and on off stump line, defended off the back foot
he fires this flat outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to deep cover
tossed up and slower, it drifts in to the batsman, who drives it back to the bowler
tossed up and slow outside off, the batsman defends it to off
he comes forward and pushes it towards cover with soft hands and calls for a quick single
he comes down the pitch and drives the flighted delivery, but straight to mid-on
he placed it towards midwicket, but Maxwell ran to the ball quickly and fired a throw towards non-striker's because Dilshan had run a few paces down.. No damage done
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, driven straight to midwicket
he comes down the track and drives it to long on for an easy single

caught at slip! What a catch by Watson, diving to his right, he picked this one low and one-handed! Doherty has been bowling well to Dilshan, he floats this one on the middle and leg line and gets it to turn just a touch, enough to beat batsman's whippy drive to the on side. Dilshan got a leading edge and Watson did the rest completing an excellent catch
fired in flat on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
tossed up and slower this time, the batsman defends it down the pitch
flat and full on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and pushes the flighted delivery  to midwicket
flatter delivery, the batsman pushes it to the gap at cover point for a single
tossed up delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he comes forward and gets and inside edge past that leg slip fielder for a single
tossed up on off stump line, the batsman pushes it to deep cover for a single
pushed through on off and middle, the batsman defends. The keeper calls it a "gorgeous length"
flatter delivery on off stump line, the batsman waits and dabs it to the gap at cover for a quick single
quicker delivery on the stumps, Mahela comes forward and defends
he makes room and stylishly chips it over the cover fielder for a couple
flatter and shorter on off, the batsman opens the face to place it to backward point
flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman nudges it towards square leg for a single
almost a return catch! The bowler shortened the length as he saw the batsman advancing and Thiri punched it almost all the way to Doherty.
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and works it past midwicket for a single
oh he is lucky here! He tried a similar inside out shout as Mahela's in the last over, but he got too much height on it..Lucky for him it landed wide of long off
he nudges this one to backward square leg for a single
he pushes it softly to square leg for a quick single, but a direct hit from the fielder at midwicket would have made that interesting
he comes forward and defends it to off
fuller length, allows the batsman to drive it to deep cover
he brings up his fifty with a front-foot nudge to deep point
flatter delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it point
he waits on the back foot and defends it to midwicket
shorter this time, Mahela is not the one to miss out on these, he waits and opens the face of the bat to run it through gully
he comes down the pitch and pushes it to mid-on for a single
tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
he dabs it to square leg for an easy single
reverse sweep from Mahela that almost looked like heading to the boundary, but McKay dives at short third man to prevent the boundary
he comes down the pitch and defends as the length is on the shorter side
quicker delivery on off, the batsman goes back and punches it through point for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
he comes down the pitch, but Big Show adjusts his length to a shorter one. Mahela defends it to midwicket
comes out of the crease to smash it over the sight screen, but he gets an inside edge as the ball turns in to him
flatter and shorter, but it spins in to the batsman, hits the thigh pads and rolls towards short third man
pushed through on the off stump line, defended back to the bowler
slower and shorter, but on the off stump line, the batsman takes a forward stride and defends
still slower, this time outside off though, the batsman chops it to backward point
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the leg side
quicker and on a length outside off, the batsman pushes it past point for a single
it's fired on the leg stump, but Mahela is quick to latch on to that, he goes down on his knee and powerfully paddles it past that leg slip fielder
a reverse-sweep this time, McKay can watch it go past him this time as this one was few meters away from him this time
slower and on off stump this time, the batsman dabs it to the right of midwicket for a quick single
he comes down the track and pushes the tossed up delivery to long off
tossed up and full outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
flatter and turning in from outside off, the batsman pushes it to the gap at cover off the back foot
another inside-out chip shot from Mahela, precise, very precise. It's over the cover fielder, but short of dep extra cover
he comes down the pitch and inside edges the intended drive on to his pads
this time he gets a single with a push to long on
shorter and flatter on off, the batsman waits and pushes it to point
fuller and quicker on off stump, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
here comes the yorker first up! Aimed at the toes, but Thiri does well to block it out
another one aimed at the toes, Thiri jams it out to mid-on this time

short delivery outside off and he has pulled it straight to the fielder at midwicket. He was done in by the pace, 143 kph on that one, and was not in control of that shot. Also, that didn't bounce as high as anyone would have expected it to, Thiri took it just below chest high. A big breakthrough although
another short delivery, but this one is down the leg side and Angelo pulls it fine on the leg side for a single
back of length delivery outside off, Mahela just bends those knees and creams it through point.. No chance for anyone..
nasty short delivery from round the wicket, hits the batsman on his wrists as he tries to whip it to the leg side.. Serious pace there
bowls a back of length delivery outside off, with a grunt, the batsman defends it from the crease
another back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it off the back foot this time
he comes down the pitch and defends the back of length delivery to cover
he comes forward and drives the length delivery on the up, but straight to mid off
back of length delivery on off, the batsman goes back and defends it solidly
it's through the midwicket fielder, Watson there! It was a fuller delivery and the batsman flicked it powerfully for a couple of runs to the deep
fires a short of length delivery that hurries on to the batsman as he tries to pull it, it was in the air for a while, but well short of the man at fine leg
Angelo gives him the charge, drives it, but straight to the man at mid off

back of length delivery of off, the batsman tries to whip it to the leg side but gets hit high on the pads. It rolls towards backward point, from where the fielder fires in a throw at non-striker's. Could have surprised the batsman had he hit
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
falls just short of Watson this time! It was a full delivery angling in and the batsman flicked it in the air, just drops short of Watson..
back of length this time, 145 kph, the batsman tries to defend it off the back foot and gets an inside edge towards square leg
short of length ball just outside off, dabbed towards short third man, no run
length ball on off stump, clipped in front of square leg for a single
just outside off, defended towards point by Mathews
strays on to the pads, helped towards short fine leg for a single
another quick single is taken, just drops the ball towards point and sets off
full ball on middle, driven towards midwicket for the fourth single of the over
quick ball from wide of the stumps, angling in towards the batsman, who defends to the leg side
shot! superb hit from Mathews, that was shortish from Johnson, Mathews backs to make room and unleashes a ferocious slap that send the ball racing to the cover boundary
tapped towards point for a single this time

Jayaewardene struggling with the wide angle from which Johnson is delivering, a somewhat round-arm action from round the wicket, Jayawardene jumps awkwardly as he defends that shortish ball from the crease
similar length and outside off, dabbed towards point where Maxwell fields
a beamer! Johnson fires in a high full toss, 146.4kph, above waist height, guided down to third man for a single
short of length ball just outside off, played with soft hands towards point for a single
he bowls it full and he bowls it wide outside off, it's slower too, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a single
this one is full-toss too and has been called a no-ball, but because he had overstepped. the batsman flicked it deep midwicket
he bowls a low full toss and Mahela easily paddles it fine to the boundary on the leg side
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to deep cover for a single
slower delivery outside off, the batsman tries to push it to cover, but is beaten
bows a good yorker on off stump, the batsman digs it out. Hits it back to the bowler

That is bowled! For a few seconds no one had any idea about what was going on! It was a full length delivery and the batsman tried to whip it to the leg side, but it flicked the off stump on its way. The bowler was busy appealing for something (maybe a caught behind as there was a sound).. But it took a while for everyone to realise that the bails were off
he attempts a yorker, but this one is down the leg side
length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it solidly back to the bowler
slower delivery on a fuller length outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
length delivery on off, the batsman whips it through midwicket
fuller length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman drives it on the up to deep cover for a single

he keeps doing this with such ease! It was a length delivery and all Mahela does it chips it with some timing over the cover fielder. No power, just timing. It easily beats the man at deep extra cover
he bowls a length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off and takes off for a single. Another attempt from the fielder, but yet again, it misses the stumps
slower delivery on  a length outside off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a single
it's a slower delivery on  a fuller length outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a single
the batsman comes forward and drives the length ball to wide mid-off for a single
finally there is a direct hit (by the bowler at striker's end), and that too when the batsmen weren't attempting a run. The ricochet allows an overthrow
he bowls it full and wide this time and the batsman creams it through cover point, the shot beats the man at deep cover
he bowls it slightly slower outside off, the batsman tries to run it down to third man but is beaten
back of length delivery on off, Chandimal dabs it to point, but decides against the single as he sees the fielder charging towards it
he goes fuller this time, the batsman punches it past the non-striker for a single
length delivery angling in towards the middle stump, the batsman whips it past midwicket for a single
length delivery on the middle, the batsman pushes it towards mid on for a single
he bowls it full and on the off stump line, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
floated up on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
flighted and full, the batsman drives it to cover
floated up on the leg stump line, the batsman drives it down the ground to long on
flatter and quicker on the off, the batsman works it away towards the leg side for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to cover
full and flighted on the middle, the batsman drives it to long on
he bowls it on a fuller length outside off, the batsman slices it to point
short of length delivery, the batsman goes back and clips it deep square leg for a single
he tries the short delivery at Mahela, who calmly ramps it fine on the off side for a single to third man and bring up his fifty
he sees fuller length and goes down on his knee to drive it to cover
back of length delivery, the batsman stays on the back foot and nudges it to deep midwicket for a single
he bowls a shortish delivery that comes in a touch into the batsman. He was trying to get away from it, but gets hit on the shoulder of the bat and ends up pushing it towards third man
he waits on the back foot and runs the length ball down to third man
attempts the full and slow delivery, but Mahela expertly chips it over the infield and well short of the fielder at long on
back of length delivery, Chandimal pushes it towards long on off the back foot
slower ball, short outside off, Mahela waits for a light year, then pulls it to deep square leg
length delivery on off, the batsman drives it on the up to the man at cover
back of length, normal pace, on the middle stump line, the batsman pushes it straight to the fielder at point
he gets a short of length ball to which he calmly makes room and taps it past gully.. Once it crosses the fielder, it races to the boundary
he bowls a slower ball, in 130s, and it beats Mahela as he plays his drive too early
he is earning a fortune from this nudges as he as always done, this time he tickles this length ball fine on the leg side
short delivery that doesn't get up too high, Mahela attempts a pull, but gets hit on the body.He takes a leg bye to the left of the keeper
here comes the yorker, it's outside off and it passes under Chandimal's bat
back of length delivery on off, Chandimal runs it down to third man for a single
back of length delivery, it's chopped towards third man for an easy single

he goes down on his knee and tries to paddle it over the short fine leg fielder, but gets a toe end towards midwicket. He takes off for a single anyway and had that throw hit the stumps, he would have been stuck on 10999. Nonetheless, he is on top of 11000 now
first six of the match, a real slog this one from Chandimal, and it just eludes the fielder at wide long on...
slower delivery outside off, the batsman drops it with soft hands towards third man for a quick couple
he chips the slower delivery over the cover fielder, but doesn't get too much timing behind that.. Just a single
another slower delivery, the batsman goes on the back foot and chops it through point for a single
he makes room and again plays that inside out chip shot over the infield. It teases the man at deep extra cover, who dives and gets to the ball, but then slides into the skirting
targets that area again, this time with a shot along the ground, but is not able to beat the man at extra cover
drives it hard again, now to mid-off, but since he is deep, they take a single
short and wide outside off, the fielder at third man was in the ring and Chandimal cuts it hard past him for well-timed boundary
low full toss on off, the batsman pushes it to cover with soft hands for a single
he goes for a reverse sweep off a full delivery, but misses. The keeper and the bowler appeal for a caught behind, but after the umpire said no, there was no interest..
he bowls a full delivery and Chandimal throws his bat at that targeting that region over extra cover, but doesn't get the timing luckily as it falls short of long off
caught at mid-on. Tries the big whack again, but it was a slower delivery and although it looked like he had made good connection, he hadn't. That went just high and not long at all. Easily gobbled
he waits on the back foot and guides the length delivery down to third man for a single
he gets a low full toss outside off and pushes it to deep cover for a single
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman chops it down to third man for a couple
he bowls a short delivery, but the batsman ducks under it and the ball goes down the leg side.. Surprisingly not called a wide
he bowls a high full-toss and Mahela who was crouching a bit for one of his dab shots, does well to swivel and pull it to deep square leg
bowls a good yorker on leg stump, but Kula jabs it down to fine leg off the toe of his bat
he makes room and drives the ball silkily to deep extra cover
attempts another leg-stump yorker, but this one is just a little too far down the leg side

bowls a slower ball outside off, the batsman tries to pull it down the ground but doesn't get hold of it. It falls around mid-on and the batsmen try to steal a second, but a quick throw from the deep catches Kula well short of his crease
he bowls a dot-ball at this stage, beats Herath's attempted cut outside off
length delivery outside off, Herath makes room and cracks it to deep point
he bowls a short of length delivery, but this is very wide down the leg side
another aerial shot falls well short of the fielder in deep, this one was cut in the air towards third-man
slower length delivery on the middle, the batsman slaps it down to fine leg for a single
quick short delivery to Herath and this one sails past head high
another short ball, Herath swings his bat but makes no connection. They steal a bye though
he moves to the leg side and just places it in the tiny gap between short third man and backward point. How does he do that?
moves to the leg side again, and then dabs the slower delivery to backward point for a single

Mahela makes room and drives it inside out, but this is straight to the man at extra cover. Mahela was not interested in the single, but Herath runs all the way down to the striker's end.. Simple run out, but doesn't really matter at this stage. Mahela is still on strike
he comes down the pitch and takes the attempted yorker on the full, whacks it over extra cover for yet another boundary in that region
slower delivery from the back of his hand, Mahela comes down the pitch and slaps it to deep cover for a quick couple
he goes for a reverse sweep this time, but this one was a quick one aimed at leg stump, he makes no connection this time and gets hit on the pads
low full toss, the batsman drives it hard, but this time he is not able to find that gap at extra cover.. It's straight to the fielder. They think about a second, but finally settle down for a single
he gets some bat on it and pushes it to midwicket. It was a single till the bowler ran to field that, but a wild throw towards the keeper allows the Sri Lankans to get back for a second

inn2.comm: what a start! Watson begins with a sensational drive through the covers for four, that was a length ball outside off, Watson leans into it and puts that away
shorter this time, closer to off stump, Watson waits in the crease and looks to dab the ball down to third man, beaten
bit of width, 134kph, shortish ball, slapped firmly towards point but well stopped by Dilshan
length ball is defended back down the track
length ball outside off, punched solidly back towards the bowler, bounces over the bowler's head, Eranga gets a hand on it but can only deflect it towards mid-off for a single
Hughes nearly bowled first ball, that wasn't too far outside off but he still goes for the cut, bottom edges it past the stumps for a streaky boundary
back of a length ball outside off, defended towards cover by Watson

Kula has done it, last match it was with the bat, this time he has removed the dangerman Shane Watson with the ball, the ball angles in towards the stumps, Watson looks to dab it behind point, no footwork from Watson, he misses and the stumps are disturbed, the Sri Lankan fans at The Oval scream to make it known how big a moment this is
way down the leg side
pushed towards cover for a single, the much-hyped Maxwell is off the mark
short of length ball on off stump, Hughes gets behind the line and defends
pegged back in the crease, looking to work the ball to the leg side, edges it towards cover
length ball just outside off, a good-looking drive towards short cover
back of a length ball from Eranga, 137kph, just outside off, Maxwell fishes for it outside off and is beaten
full and on the pads, lofted over mid-on and there's a long chase for Malinga, only two runs result though, should have pushed for three there
Eranga gets the ball to sway away a touch outside off, Maxwell hangs his bat outside off and is beaten once more
length ball on the pads, huge appeal for lbw but that looked to be sliding down leg, the ball dribbles in front of square leg
length ball outside off, Hughes goes for his favourite cut, and he is late on it, mistimes it to the off side
a touch shorter and on leg stump, Hughes looks ungainly as he blocks that to the leg side
great line just outside off, Maxwell pokes at it and is beaten once more
the Big Show gets going with a lofted drive over extra cover, it was a full ball and that is launched for a boundary

beautiful shot from Maxwell, a length ball and Maxwell takes a pace out of the crease and lifts that over the bowler's head, minimal effort, lovely swing of the bat, and the ball sails over the rope towards the sightscreen
terrific come back from Kulasekara, Maxwell was backing away, Kula follows him and that ricochets of his body, between the keeper and slip for four leg byes
slants this in towards the pads, strikes the pads as well, an lbw appeal but that was sliding down
shorter from Kulasekara, Maxwell skates down the track and tries to hammer the ball down the track, can't get it past the bowler

someone tell Hughes where the middle of the bat is, all edges here, this time a French cut for four, he was looking to drive that through the covers, that ball was well outside off, ends up as four runs for Australia
dabbed behind point for a single
short of length ball outside off, Maxwell slaps it back towards the bowler
thrashes that through cover, how hard was that hit? Maxwell skips down the track and lashes that short of length ball through the off side for four
full ball heading for the leg stump, Maxwell gets his front leg out of the way and drills that wide of mid-on for four, Maxwell gallops to 21
shortish ball just outside off, Maxwell wants to club that over midwicket but he can't connect
Hughes finally connects properly with the cut, gets well forward and chops that past point for four more

what sort of shot is that? Hughes guides that off the middle of the bat to the keeper, looking to steer that to third man but he doesn't get enough on it, Australia lose their second, it was a back of a length ball outside off, Hughes tried to be too cute and paid the price
short of length ball outside off, Bailey gets off the mark by guiding that down to third man for a single, showing Hughes how it is done
Maxwell throwing his bat at everything, short ball just outside off, a powerful pull in front of square leg for four, the man in the deep puts in a dive but that was too quick for him
slides down the leg side, a free run for Australia
full ball just outside off, squeezed out towards extra cover for a single
slanting in towards off stump, defended towards mid-on
starts off with a slower-ball yorker, but he misses his direction, it's down the leg side
he makes room and tries to slam it over long-on, but hits it high, really high and it comes down in the vacant region at wide long on
slower delivery on a length and what does big show do? He slams it down the ground. Mid-off had no chance

no answers to this one from Malinga! He must have played these a few times in Mumbai, but he hasn't learnt much. It was a slower ball yorker and Maxwell, who was making room, missed it completely. The leg stump takes a beating
he attempts a slower yorker again, but this one is wide down the leg side..
tests the batsman with a short one, who does well to hop on the crease and tuck it to square leg
back of length delivery, but this one is on the pads and Voges picks up his first runs to fine leg
he bowls another full slower delivery, the batsman watches it carefully and defends it down the ground
he makes room and pushes the length delivery to wide mid-off for a quick single
the batsman is squared up by a length delivery on off, he pushes this one to cover point
this one comes in from a short of length, the batsman defends it towards the leg side off the back foot
back of length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards covers and they take a quick single
a misfield by Rangana at mid-on allows a single. It was hit straight to him, a bit hard though, but those ones should be stopped
he angles this one in to the batsman who tucks it to deep square leg for a single
he bowls a length ball, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it in the gap at cover for a single
loud appeal for lbw, but that was a ridiculous appeal! That full-toss was clearly heading down the leg side. The batsman was beaten by the lack of pace on that though

exactly the same delivery and this time it results in a wicket! Kula is on fire. He was there at short fine leg and fires in a flat throw to catch Bailey well short of the crease. The batsman was stealing a leg-bye there.
a 123 kph yorker to the new man, who just gets his bat down in time
full delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it down the pitch
low full-toss on the pads, the batsman flicks it wide mid-on and another throw comes in.. Safe this time though
he keeps it tight around the channel, Voges pushes it to point off the front foot
he bowls a back-of-the-hand slower ball on a length, the batsman tucks it to deep midwicket for a single
bowls a length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
and again, he defends it to point form the crease
there is an appeal from Sanga for caught behind, but no one else was interested. It was a length delivery outside off and the batsman played inside the line
a diving Sangakkara saves Malinga of some embarrassment. This was way down the leg side
he stays in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to cover
he gets a yorker this time and does well to flick it to deep midwicket
he gets up on his toes and defends the back of length delivery to the off side
he bowls a yorker again, this time it's wide outside off, Marsh blocks it out to the off side
he comes forward and slices the low full toss to deep cover
another one of those slow thigh-high full-tosses, this one is down the leg side
he waits in the crease and chops the length delivery to point
slow and very slow on off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he stays on the back foot and pushes the length ball to off for a single
waits on the back foot and defends it back down the pitch
he comes down the pitch and drives the tossed up delivery to long on
flatter and slow heading towards middle, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover
he bowls a length ball on off, the batsman pushes it to point off the front foot
he walks down the pitch and punches the short of length delivery in the air towards wide mid-off, Malinga there does well
he pushes the length ball towards deep cover for a single
slower offcutter on off stump, the batsman slaps it straight to midwicket
a direct hit from midwicket there would have had the batsman! Even the dive wouldn't have saved him.. But the fielder missed it
a very slow offcutter, it made the batsman wait and wait, Marsh tries to chop it to the off side and played inside the line. The ball knocks the offstump back. Aussies are crumbling
slow length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
tossed up, but on a length, the batsman goes on the back foot and tucks it to square leg for a single

loud loud appeal from Sanga as the batsman gets hit on the pads with a turning ball. Herath went over the wicket to the left-hander and got the ball to turn in from outside off. the batsman tried to tickle it to the leg side, but got hit on the pads. Sri Lanka call for a review, but that one just hit the batsman outside the line.. That would have hit the leg stump though
he comes down the pitch to a tossed up delivery wide outside off, defends to off
he comes forward and works it away to square leg for a single
quicker delivery on the off stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side off the back foot
he bowls a slower delivery on a length outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends to off
cracking shot by Wade! He jumped out on this slower delivery, made room as he did so, and timed it through point
another slower delivery that hits the pad as the batsman misses his flick, Angelo appeals, but that pitched outside leg
he comes down the pitch again and manages to drag the short of length delivery through backward square leg for a boundary. Not in full control of that shot
slower delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
he tries to whack this through off side, but is beaten by the slowness of that ball
he bowls the arm-ball, the batsman makes room and cuts it hard, but finds the fielder at point
this time he comes out of the crease and drives the full delivery hard down the ground to long on
now Wade comes out of the crease but is not to the pitch of the ball, defends it back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, the batsman sweeps it from there and drags it to deep square leg
tries to toss it up, but the batsman comes down the crease and takes it on the full, drives it hard straight down the ground, but Dilshan at long on cuts it off
this one is massive massive hit! it was tossed up outside off and the batsman jumped out of the crease to launch it way way over the sight screen
bowls a slower length ball on off, the batsman pushes it to deep point for a single
he walks across the stumps but gets a yorker wide outside off, the batsman blocks it out towards off and takes a single
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover off the back foot
now fires in on Wade's boots, the batsman gets his foot out of the way and blocks it back to the bowler
oh beautifully smacked over midwicket! It was a short delivery on the body and Wade was quick to swivel and pull it hard over the infield
fired on to the pads, but the batsman digs it out towards long on for a single
length delivery wide outside off and Wade smashes it over extra cover, but this is a big outfield. It teases the man from deep extra cover, who dives, but is not able to save that boundary
that was a stinger! Angelo at extra cover gets hands to it diving full length to his left, but that was hit very hard and it is not fair to put that as a drop

he tries to whack this length ball, but inside edges back down the pitch. The non-striker wants a single and runs through, Wade starts belatedly and runs along with the ball and there is a mid-pitch collision between Kula and Wade...Kula goes down, Wade makes it to the other end. Kula looks at the umpire, but I think Wade was running in a straight line
back of the hand slower ball, Voges comes forward and defends it towards midwicket
length delivery on off, the batsman slaps it down to long on for a single
he comes down the pitch but Kula bowls it full and wide outside off and beats the bat
there comes the slower ball yorker again, but Voges does well to drive it past midwicket for three down to cow corner
this time it's the pacy yorker, Wade just pushes it to extra cover for a single
slower delivery on a length outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a couple
he bowls it full and on the pads, the batsman drives that easily down to long on for a single
he takes a step down the pitch and tucks the length delivery to square leg for a single
here comes another yorker and Voges digs it out to deep backward square leg for another couple

caught at long-off! Wade falls after a brief counter-attacking innings and it sets off the Sri Lankan fielders into wild celebrations. It was a length delivery wide outside off and Wade tried to whack it straight down the ground but got a thick leading edge that ballooned over the infield, but Dilshan at long-off was waiting for it
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off for a single
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly off the front foot
he bowls a bouncer this time, quite pacy as well, Faulkner sways out of line just in time
now he follows it up with a slower delivery, the batsman dabs it towards gully for a single
now he bowls a yorker which the batsman digs out to long on for a single
slower length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman steers it down to third man
that is a good bouncer, right in front of the batsman's face. Faulkner does well to drop it down right in front of him, although he didn't know where it was for a brief moment
another short ball, this time the batsman dabs it to gully for a single
he bowls a slower delivery with a lot of under-spin, the batsman flat-bats it back to the bowler
good yorker, somehow it misses the off stump! The batsman was making room to carve it through covers, but was beaten by the lack of pace on it
that is a wild wild delivery! Sanga did his best, but that was still too wide. Five wides down the leg side
fires in a yorker on the middle stump, the batsman digs it out to mid-off for a single
the batsman comes down the pitch and takes the flighted delivery on the full, but gets a toe end as he drives it over the bowler's head

that was the left-hander's carrom ball and the batsman somehow managed to get a bat on it, he chopped it towards gully, but there was a direct hit at the non-striker's end. The umpire checks with the third umpire, but the batsman made it in time
he sweeps it, and sweeps it fine in the gap at deep backward square leg. It was finer than where he was intending to hit that, but a good result for him
full delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman crisply times it past the non-striker
he comes down the pitch, but Herath fires it down the leg side. The batsman does well to pad it away
full delivery, it is tucked to square leg for a quick single
he bowls a slower delivery, the batsman comes down the pitch and pushes it to long off for a single
another slower delivery, this one is almost like a spinner's flighted one, it beats the bat as the batsman plays inside the line
another slower ball, but this time Faulkner created his own pace by jumping down the pitch and crashing that through extra cover for a boundary
here comes the ramp shot! It didn't have too much pace on it as it was a slower ball, but it was right in the gap between the keeper and short fine leg fielder
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover for a single
another slower delivery, the batsman pushes it through cover for a single

that looked like he was out the moment the ball hit the bat! Huge leading edge that went towards covers, but the fielder there was close in and he had to run backwards to get to that. In the end, he just got a hand to it
he comes down the pitch, but Herath fires it on the pads. Voges manages to get some pad on it as had he missed it, he would have been a stumping candidate
full delivery on the leg stump, the batsman drives it to midwicket where the fielder makes a good stop
he swipes across the line to play that to deep midwicket
flat and quick on leg stump , the batsman drives it hard to deep midwicket
super catch by Sanga! It was tossed up on off, the batsman wanted to swipe it across the line, it turned and took the toe-end Sanga made it look easy
he bowls a quick length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it straight to point
back of length delivery on the middle, the batsman chops it to gully and steals a quick single
that was quick and menacing outside off! The batsman is beaten as he plays inside the line
he tries to pull this short of length delivery, but plays it without any timing to mid on
length delivery wide outside off and the batsman drives it on the up straight down the ground for a boundary

another catch for Kula, this one at mid-off. Johnson tries to smash it down the ground again, but this delivery was slightly wider and he didn't reach for it, he got a healthy top-edge and today, Kula is unlikely to make any mistake
pushed through on the middle stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
pushes it down the leg side, called a wide
flatter delivery on the middle and leg line, more back foot defence
slower this time, on the pads, the batsman is unable to get any bat on that and gets hit on the pads
slower again, the batsman pushes it to midwicket off the back foot
more slowness from Herath, defended off the back foot
now he fires it full on off stump, the batsman takes a forward step and drives it to cover
length delivery, the batsman makes room and drives it through off, but the fielder at cover makes a diving stop
full and honing in on off stump, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
short of length delivery, but this one slides down the leg side
slower offcutter outside off, the batsman dabs it to point and leaves the crease. Dilshan from point fires it at the non-striker's end, hits the stumps, but Voges is just in
he almost drives it back to the bowler! He bowled it slightly slower and it hit the bat a little high as the batsman came forward to push it
he comes forward and drives the length ball on the up to deep cover
makes room, but he is not able to do much as it's an excellent yorker on the leg stump. He is only able to push it back to the bowler
flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman punches it to deep midwicket for a single
fired down the leg side, it's very wide
another slider and it's down the leg side again. The keeper is not able to take it cleanly, and the batsman steal's an extra
tossed up delivery on the pads, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
full and flighted on the middle, the batsman comes forward and drives it down to long off
he goes back to a length ball, and gets hit on the pads, but that was heading down the leg side
he comes forward and pushes the full delivery towards mid on for a single
he comes forwards and dabs it to square leg for a single
short ball that follows the batsman as he makes room, but Voges slaps it to deep square leg boundary with ease
full delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it down the ground to long on for a single
he bowls a short delivery, but this one is outside off and the batsman easily ducks under it
another short delivery, this time it is better directed and beats the bat as the batsman misses his pull
length delivery on off, the batsman drives it on the up, but straight to cover
he bowls a yorker which the batsman drives it back to him
goes for a yorker, but it is not full enough. Ideal half-volley for the batsman to whack it over midwicket.
now the batsman gets a leg-stump yorker which he times nicely to deep midwicket for a single
he bowls a slower delivery just outside off, hangs in the air before coming down, it beats the batsman
another yorker, McKay calmly digs it out back to the bowler
bowls a full toss on the pads, McKay calmly tucks it to deep square leg for an easy couple
another attempted yorker, but this could have been expensive. McKay flicked that well, but straight to the man at midwicket
here comes an appeal for stumping! It was tossed up on off, it dipped, then turned past the outside edge. Did the batsman slide his foot out? Yes he did, but looks like he just got it back in time
caught at long-on! The end is nigh, Voges tries to smash it over long-on but played it straight into the hands of Eranga..
he comes forward to a pushed through delivery, and is lucky to get an inside edge to that
he goes back and tucks the length delivery to square leg for a single
he goes back and defends the length delivery down the pitch
pushed further up, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
bowls a length delivery that is angled across the left-hander, he is beaten as he plays inside the line
another quick length delivery veering away from the batsman, another play and miss
length delivery outside off, the batsman steers it to third man for a single
short of length delivery, the batsman hops and tucks it to behind square on the leg side for a single
tries a yorker on the leg stump, but it's down the leg side
bowls a slower delivery on the pads, the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
fires a quick length delivery on the pads, Mckay tucks it to square leg off the back foot
tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman eases it to long off for a single
tossed up outside off, the batsman drives it firmly back to the bowler
now he takes a forward stride and defends the flighted delivery
again, takes a forward step and defends it to the leg side
he bowls a quicker one on the middle stump line and the batsman does well to tuck it to backward square leg off the back foot
bowls the slider on off stump, the batsman defends it easily off the back foot
bowls it short, but it's not that quick. Doherty easily gets behind that in defence
bowls a good yorker on off stump, but Doherty squeezes it out towards point
bowls a sharp bouncer this time, but it's outside off and the batsman safely stays out of the way
another short ball outside off, this time McKay sways away from the line
oh that is a shot that would have done a lot of players proud. It was a length delivery and McKay so calmly drives it over mid-off, sheer timing in that one
menacing yorker aimed at the boot, McKay digs this out to backward square leg with ease too
he bowls it slow and short, it allows the batsman to go back and punch it past midwicket for a single
another one that is slow and slightly short, the batsman goes back and punches it to long on
tossed up and full on off, the batsman drives it to long-on for a single
full and on the leg stump, the batsman tries to drive it to midwicket but gets an inside edge fine on the leg side
he comes forward and defends the flatter delivery to the off
the bowler gives it some air, the batsman gives it more air by smashing it to the cow corner for a one bounce four
he bowls it full outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
back of length delivery on off, doesn't bounce that much, the batsman defends it off the back foot
another back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly to the off side
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid off
bowls a slower yorker on leg stump, the batsman was shuffling across, but digs it out somehow
another length ball, more resolute defence from Doherty
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the right of the bowler
full and flighted, driven back to the bowler
pushed through on the middle stump line, the batsman tucks it to midwicket for a single
pushed through outside off from round the wicket, Doherty defends
full and flighted on the middle, the batsman eases it to long on for a single
pushed through outside off, the batsman gets an outside edge for a couple..Sanga appeals, Dilshan joins him later... Appeal? Seriously? for an outside edge?
he tries to push the length delivery to off, but chops it very close to the stumps..All safe in the end
back of length delivery on off, Doherty defends it off the back foot
bowls a full delivery on the pads, the batsman flicks it in the air towards fine leg for an easy single

length delivery on off, McKay pushes it softly to mid-off and runs for an easy single. There was a wild throw from Malinga and could have been an overthrow had the midwicket fielder not dived to stop that
short delivery, the batsman gets down on his knees to avoid that as it didn't get too high
slower and fuller, he pushes it to mid-off for a single and it could have been tight if the fielder had not fumbled it...
tossed up full on the leg stump, the batsman digs it out
now he comes forward and solidly defends it to off
pushed through on the middle stump line, more solid defence from Doherty
pushed through just outside off, Doherty pushes it in the gap at cover for a single
fuller delivery on the pads, it is easily nudged to deep square leg for a single
there is some turn for Dilshan, but the batsman softly plays it towards short third man
he bowls it on back of length, McKay defends it easily to the off side
he bowls a good yorker on off stump, but McKay, without any pressure here, digs it out like a top-order batsman
length delivery on the pads, the batsman defends it to the leg side this time
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
he bowls a short delivery, bounces well over the batsman and it's another run...
length delivery outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it to point..
length delivery on off, McKay wristily drives it to midwicket
solid forward defence by Doherty, a slip is waiting for a catch
flatter delivery outside off, he waits in the crease and punches it to deep cover for a single
flatter delivery on a length, McKay pushes it to the off side, but no run
on the pads, McKay goes back and nudges it to deep square leg for a single
that was the ball and that broke Doherty's concentration! Tossed up and slow, the batsman went for a booming drive, got an outside edge past slip.. Very lucky.. very very lucky
now he goes back into the shell again, defends solidly
length delivery just outside off, defended towards point
he goes full on off stump, McKay digs it out easily to mid on
length delivery on off, the batsman takes a forward step and pushes it to cover
he bowls a good slower delivery on the middle stump, but this is again easily dealt with, pushed to long on for a single
fuller delivery, it is pushed to mid-on and they take off for a single, Thirimanne fires in a throw and hits the stumps direct at non-strikers end but Doherty looked alright.. Slid his bat along..
length delivery on off, the batsman comes solidly behind it to push it back to the bowler
full and flighted on off, Doherty drives that to long off for a single
he drove it almost back to the bowler! Almost.. just a metre ahead of him.. Dilshan smiles..

he catches it this time! Absolute blinder by Dilshan to set off wild celebrations on the ground. The crowd has found its voice! It was another flatter delivery, shorter too and the batsman punched it back.. Dilshan was moving to his right, but the ball was hit to his left at a comfortable height, but he quickly changed direction and plucked it out from nowhere, it was drifting away from him all the time.. Special catch to finally end Australia's resistance
